programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: Terrorists seize control of an ice-hockey stadium in the middle of a match attended by the US vice president. Taking the politician hostage, they threaten to blow up the building at the final whistle - but a resourceful former fireman takes it upon himself to thwart their dastardly plot. Action thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Powers Boothe, Raymond J Barry and Whittni Wright

programme.title: ID2: Shadwell Army
programme.desc: A police officer goes undercover as a football hooligan to bring far-right extremists to justice. Sequel to the 1995 crime thriller, starring Simon Rivers, Linus Roache, Paul Popplewell and Andy Rush

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Amnesiac rogue assassin Jason Bourne's long-buried memories are reawakened by a British journalist researching the secret organisation that was responsible for transforming him into a killing machine. Meanwhile, a ruthless CIA director becomes convinced Bourne is still a security risk, and plans to dispose of him once and for all. Third instalment of the spy thriller series, directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Matt Damon, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Paddy Considine, Scott Glenn and Albert Finney

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: A smart-mouthed PR executive answers a public phone and the caller on the other end warns him that if he hangs up he will be shot. The unseen gunman then puts his target through a tortuous series of mind games, as well as incriminating him in the death of a bystander. Psychological thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Kiefer Sutherland, Katie Holmes and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor

programme.title: The Mexican
programme.desc: A petty crook finds himself in a tricky situation when he tries to smuggle an antique gun from Mexico into America for his Mob boss. As events begin to spiral out of control, his girlfriend's displeasure and a pursuing hitman only add to the would-be bootlegger's woes. Comedy thriller directed by Gore Verbinski, with Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, James Gandolfini, Gene Hackman and JK Simmons

programme.title: Alleycats
programme.desc: A bicycle courier believes he has witnessed a murder, and flees for his life. However, he resolves later to uncover the truth of what he saw and investigates further, leading him into a dangerous world of political corruption and illegal bike racing. Action thriller, starring Josh Whitehouse, Eleanor Tomlinson and John Hannah

programme.title: The Hatton Garden Job
programme.desc: A ragtag group of career criminals plot an audacious, multi-million-pound raid on an underground facility in London. True-life crime drama, with Stephen Moyer, Larry Lamb and Matthew Goode

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: FBI agent Sean Archer captures terrorist Castor Troy, the man who killed his son. While Troy is in a coma, Archer has the crook's face surgically grafted onto his own so he can go undercover and locate a bomb planted somewhere in Los Angeles. But then Troy regains consciousness - and in turn takes on Archer's identity. John Woo's action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Travolta, Joan Allen, Gina Gershon and Dominique Swain

programme.title: Dog Eat Dog
programme.desc: A crew of former prisoners are hired by a Cleveland crime syndicate to kidnap the baby of a rival mobster. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Willem Dafoe and Christopher Matthew Cook

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his family's Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Conclusion of Francis Ford Coppola's crime drama trilogy, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach, Bridget Fonda and Joe Mantegna

programme.title: Delinquent
programme.desc: A trouble-making teen is thrilled to finally join his dad's criminal gang, but when a robbery goes wrong he's left struggling to deal with the fall-out. Crime drama, starring Erin Darke, Kim Director and Bill Sage

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: An Interpol agent and a district attorney discover a major international bank is involved in a vast range of illegal activities, from insider trading to arms deals and bringing down governments. As they battle to expose the truth, they find the corrupt organisation not only has the law on its side, but will kill to keep the secrets safe. Thriller, starring Clive Owen and Naomi Watts

programme.title: Desierto
programme.desc: A group of immigrants hoping to make it across the US-Mexico border are targeted by a deranged, gun-wielding vigilante. Thriller, starring Gael Garcia Bernal and Jeffrey Dean Morgan

programme.title: Southern Fury
programme.desc: When his brother falls foul of a ruthless mobster, a straight-laced man calls on his old friend and cop to help out. Crime thriller, starring Adrian Grenier, John Cusack and Nicolas Cage

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A fishing boat crew plucks a man out of the sea with two bullet wounds in his back and a safe-deposit number sewn into his skin - but absolutely no memory of who he is or how he got there. In the search for his true identity, he is pursued by assassins - but his skill at evading them suggests his own past is far from straightforward. Thriller, starring Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen and Brian Cox

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: The amnesiac assassin is living quietly in hiding, until his former employers come after him again and murder his girlfriend. A CIA operation has ended in disaster, and those responsible intend to clear their names by implicating Bourne. As the former secret agent tries to evade the hitmen on his trail, he also struggles to piece together the truth about his past. Action thriller sequel, starring Matt Damon, Brian Cox, Joan Allen and Julia Stiles

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the Da Vinci Code expert suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: A police officer in a future Detroit ravaged by crime is seemingly killed in the line of duty, but is rebuilt as a law-enforcing cyborg by the corporation that has taken over running the force. He begins to remember his human life and seeks to bring his killers to justice - a mission that leads him to turn on his corrupt corporate masters. Sci-fi thriller, starring Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Ronny Cox and Miguel Ferrer

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: The story of 1970s drug kingpin Frank Lucas, whose innovative methods of smuggling heroin into the US made him one of the leading figures in the New York underworld. A detective is assigned to bring Lucas's empire down, but his investigation is undermined by police corruption. Ridley Scott's fact-based crime drama, starring Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Josh Brolin(n)

programme.title: My Father Die
programme.desc: A deaf mute waits almost two decades to get his hands on his abusive father. Action drama, starring Joe Anderson, John Schneider and Kevin Gage(n)

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster(n)

programme.title: Dick Tracy
programme.desc: An incorruptible Chicago cop launches a relentless campaign to stop a ruthless gangster plotting to take control of the city. But the detective finds himself distracted by the attentions of a seductive nightclub singer and a faceless vigilante playing both sides against the middle. Comic-strip adventure, directed by and starring Warren Beatty, with Madonna, Al Pacino and Dustin Hoffman(n)

programme.title: Locked In
programme.desc: Sandra, a former pop star who put her career on hold to have a baby, suspects her producer-husband is now having an affair with a younger rising starlet. Determined to catch him out, she decides to surprise him by driving to Los Angeles with her young son in her new Monolith, a `super-car' with advanced security features. However, a series of unfortunate events leaves Sandra locked out of the car in the middle of the desert, while her son is trapped inside, and in mortal peril. Thriller, starring Katrina Bowden(n)

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon(n)

programme.title: Hoffa
programme.desc: Biopic of the American union leader, who was a key figure in a labour organisation of truck drivers for three decades, a role that brought him into conflict with both the federal government and into dangerous alliances with organised crime - which may have led to his mysterious disappearance. Starring Jack Nicholson, Armand Assante, John C Reilly and Danny DeVito, who also directed(n)

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a chameleonic US agent faces one of the most dangerous assignments of his life when he infiltrates the intricate criminal network of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. Drama, starring Bryan Cranston, John Leguizamo and Diane Kruger(n)

programme.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
programme.desc: Ruthless stockbroker Gordon Gekko is released from prison after eight years, reinventing himself as an author and lecturer warning against the dangers of the financial system. Gekko helps a young banker get revenge on the company that drove his mentor to suicide, but as always, has a crooked agenda of his own. Oliver Stone's sequel to his 1980s drama, with Michael Douglas, Shia LaBeouf and Carey Mulligan(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former government operative Jason Bourne is drawn out of hiding to uncover more truths about his father, while CIA director Robert Dewey orders his head of cyber-security to hunt him down. Action thriller, starring Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander and Julia Stiles(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett search for a $100million heroin consignment brazenly stolen by a French drug kingpin from the police evidence room. However, after a mix-up over a phone call from a potential witness, each cop has to assume the other's identity - Lowrey becoming the henpecked family man and Burnett the playboy. Michael Bay's action thriller, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Tea Leoni, Tcheky Karyo and Theresa Randle(n)

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin
programme.desc: An inner-city drug dealer puts his life of crime behind him after a near-fatal shooting to pursue a new career as a rap artist. Unfortunately, when he performs songs inspired by his shady past, his former criminal associates do not take kindly to having their misdeeds immortalised in music. Drama, starring Curtis `50 Cent' Jackson, Terrence Howard and Ashley Walters(n)

programme.title: Videodrome
programme.desc: A sleazy TV producer investigates a violent pirate broadcast that may be a real snuff movie. In the process, he uncovers a sinister plot to turn the public into brainless drones through their televisions. David Cronenberg's surreal horror, starring James Woods, Sonja Smits, Deborah Harry and Peter Dvorsky

programme.title: Abattoir
programme.desc: A reporter investigates the story of a man trying to build a haunted house out of rooms where terrible things have happened. Horror from Saw veteran Darren Lynn Bousman, starring Joe Anderson, Jessica Lowndes and Lin Shaye

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: A mild-mannered doctor sets up practice in a small town, but a cloud gathers over his career due to a series of unexplained deaths. Before long, he has to convince the locals that a horde of venomous spiders is responsible and confront his intense fear of arachnids into the bargain. Comedy horror, starring Jeff Daniels, John Goodman, Julian Sands and Brian McNamara

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young shop assistant in Victorian England enters a magical parallel world in search of a fallen star to give to the girl of his dreams. However, the star in question is in fact a beautiful woman, who he helps flee from a wicked witch and a murderous prince. Fantasy adventure, based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Mark Strong and Sienna Miller. Narrated by Ian McKellen

programme.title: Ouija: Origin Of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her two daughters add a new stunt to boost their seance scam business. However, they get more than they bargained for when they invite an evil presence into their home. Supernatural horror prequel, starring Elizabeth Reaser and Annalise Basso

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young shop assistant in Victorian England enters a magical parallel world in search of a fallen star to give to the girl of his dreams. However, the star in question is in fact a beautiful woman, who he helps flee from a wicked witch and a murderous prince. Fantasy adventure, based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Mark Strong and Sienna Miller. Narrated by Ian McKellen

Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel

programme.title: Raw
programme.desc: After a trainee vet and strict vegetarian is pressured into eating meat for the first time, she develops a craving for flesh. Horror, starring Garance Marillier, Ella Rumpf and Rabah Nait Oufella. In French

programme.title: Bite
programme.desc: While on her hen night getaway, Casey, the bride-to-be, gets a seemingly harmless bite from an unknown insect, but soon develops a taste for human flesh. Horror, starring Elma Begovic, Annette Wozniak and Denise Yuen

programme.title: The Greasy Strangler
programme.desc: A tour guide competes with his son for the love of a woman as a murderer terrorises their neighbourhood. Comedy horror, starring Michael St Michaels and Sky Elobar

programme.title: Project: ALF
programme.desc: A lovable alien is captured by the US army who plan to destroy him, prompting two officers to come to his aid. Spin-off from the sci-fi comedy TV series, with Miguel Ferrer, Ed Begley Jr and Martin Sheen

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: A clumsy teenager develops superhuman powers after a genetically engineered spider bites him. At first his fantastic skills delight him, but his elation is severely tempered by a family tragedy, prompting him to dedicate his talents to combating evil. However, he faces a baptism of fire in the form of crazed villain the Green Goblin. Comic-book superhero adventure, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco and Rosemary Harris

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker continues his fight for justice, but unrequited love and personal worries take their toll and he is tempted to abandon his web-slinging alter ego. However, the arrival of deadly new bad guy Doctor Octopus plunges him into a race against time to save New York. Comic-book adventure sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco and Rosemary Harris

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his father's villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: After being sentenced to death, murder suspect Callum Lynch enters a virtual world in the search for a device that contains genetic code for free will. Video game adaptation, starring Michael Fassbender, Marion Cotillard, Jeremy Irons and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Frankenstein
programme.desc: Two married scientists artificially create a creature, only to abandon it. Their creation survives, and is left to fend for himself on the streets of Los Angeles. Faced with violence and persecution, and struggling to control his emotions, he is drawn to confront his makers. Modern-day adaptation of the classic horror tale, starring Xavier Samuel, Carrie-Anne Moss, Danny Huston and Tony Todd(n)

programme.title: Alien Nation
programme.desc: A race of aliens fleeing slavery seeks shelter on Earth. One of their number becomes a cop, and is paired with a bigoted human partner to investigate a murder. However, they soon find the case leads to a secret that has devastating repercussions for the extraterrestrial community. Sci-fi adventure, starring James Caan, Mandy Patinkin and Terence Stamp(n)

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: A reporter travels to Singapore to investigate her sister's mysterious death, and enlists the aid of her brother-in-law in getting to the truth. She discovers a connection to a series of similar deaths, and faces a demonic entity that is using modern technology to complete an ancient mission. Horror, starring Elizabeth Rice and Matthew Settle(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky(n)

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A giant mutant lizard spawned from an atomic test rampages through the streets of New York, defying the combined might of the US Army and Navy as it searches for a quiet place to hatch its eggs. A bookish radiation expert and a shady French secret agent join forces to defeat the creature. Hollywood remake of the Japanese monster adventure, starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo and Hank Azaria(n)

programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Cameras follow events that took place at a 1970s Pennsylvania research facility used to investigate the existence of supernatural powers. Found-footage horror, starring Rya Kihlstedt, William Mapother and Sharon Maughan(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Wizarding Brit Newt Scamander arrives in 1920s New York with a bagful of magical creatures that proceed to cause chaos. Harry Potter prequel, starring Eddie Redmayne, Katherine Waterston and Colin Farrell(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, a cyborg government agent goes in search of a mysterious hacker. Sci-fi fantasy based on an acclaimed comic book, starring Scarlett Johansson, Michael Carmen Pitt and Juliette Binoche(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose(n)

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a chameleonic US agent faces one of the most dangerous assignments of his life when he infiltrates the intricate criminal network of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. Drama, starring Bryan Cranston, John Leguizamo and Diane Kruger

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town singer creates a bold alternate identity for herself, and records a music video. The song becomes an internet sensation and she soon finds her alter ego becoming a huge star - but risks losing touch with the things that matter the most to her. Drama based on the 1980s cartoon series, starring Aubrey Peeples, Stefanie Scott and Molly Ringwald

programme.title: The Accountant: Special
programme.desc: A look at the new thriller starring Ben Affleck and Anna Kendrick

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: The captain of a British warship engages in a tense battle of wits and an escalating test of nerves with a French counterpart during the Napoleonic conflict, a pursuit that takes his crew on a dangerous journey along the coast of South America. Seafaring drama, adapted from Patrick O'Brian's novels, starring Russell Crowe, Paul Bettany, James D'Arcy, Billy Boyd and Edward Woodall

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A pair of fuzzy-headed trolls embark on a daring rescue mission when members of their tribe are kidnapped. Animation, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A theatre-owning koala sets up a singing competition in a last-ditch bid to stay afloat. Animation, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane and Scarlett Johansson

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: A mercenary is pulled into a centuries-old battle between Chinese warriors and giant, lizard-like monsters. Fantasy adventure, starring Matt Damon, Willem Dafoe and Tian Jing

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A pair of fuzzy-headed trolls embark on a daring rescue mission when members of their tribe are kidnapped. Animation, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell

programme.title: K-Shop
programme.desc: A Bournemouth takeaway owner despairs of his drunken, abusive customers and is finally pushed to the limit when his father is killed in a violent altercation. He begins murdering the people who make his life a misery, and disposes of the bodies by making them into kebabs. Horror, starring Reece Noi and Ewen MacIntosh

programme.title: Michael Jackson's This Is It
programme.desc: Documentary following rehearsals for the singer's planned 50-night series of concerts at London's O2, immediately before his untimely death in 2009. Featuring interviews with Jackson, performances of classic hits including Billy Jean and Wanna Be Startin' Something, and an insight into the elaborate preparations for the shows that were never staged

programme.title: Mine
programme.desc: Following a failed assassination attempt, a soldier is stranded in the desert where he must survive the elements and stay sane enough to survive. Thriller, starring Armie Hammer, Annabelle Wallis and Tom Cullen

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown

programme.title: Live by Night
programme.desc: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan. Crime drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck, with Elle Fanning, Remo Girone and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown

programme.title: Live by Night
programme.desc: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan. Crime drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck, with Elle Fanning, Remo Girone and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan

programme.title: Public Enemies
programme.desc: Fact-based crime drama following the last years of John Dillinger, whose run of bank robberies and daring prison escapes in the 1930s make him both America's most wanted criminal and a hero to a public struggling through the Depression. His career is soon to be cut short by the birth of the FBI, which assigns its most celebrated agent to bring him to justice. Directed by Michael Mann and starring Johnny Depp, Christian Bale and Marion Cotillard(n)

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: A professor performs a social experiment designed to analyse abusive behaviour. He recruits 24 students and places them in a simulated prison, selecting some of the group to live as guards and some as convicts. The results take an unexpectedly terrifying turn, as power corrupts the guards and makes them indulge in sadistic behaviour. Fact-based drama, starring Billy Crudup and Ezra Miller(n)

programme.title: The Ottoman Lieutenant
programme.desc: A strong-willed American nurse travels to Turkey on the cusp of the First World War, and soon falls for a dashing Ottoman army lieutenant. Drama, starring Michiel Huisman, Hera Hilmar and Josh Hartnett(n)

programme.title: The Tiger Hunter
programme.desc: A young Indian man moves to 1970s Chicago in the hope of impressing his childhood crush and living up to the legacy of his father, but not everything goes to plan. Comedy, starring Danny Pudi, Rizwan Manji and Jon Heder(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: Homer unwittingly pollutes Lake Springfield, so the US government decides to isolate the city underneath a giant dome. The Simpsons manage to escape and plan to start a new life in Alaska - but learn Springfield is about to be destroyed, and return to save their friends. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright and Yeardley Smith(n)

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A team of scientists on the International Space Station fight for survival when an intelligent alien life form is brought on board. The creature, nicknamed Calvin, proves it will do anthing to stay alive, and the crew risk everything to ensure it does not make its way to Earth. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds and Ariyon Bakare(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2
programme.desc: The team of intergalactic outlaws must fight to stay together as they unravel the mystery surrounding Peter Quill's father. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana and Kurt Russell, with the voices of Bradley Cooper and Vin Diesel(n)

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving are targeted by the authorities in 1950s Virginia, leading to an historic legal battle. Fact-based drama, starring Ruth Negga, Joel Edgerton and Will Dalton(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: Homer unwittingly pollutes Lake Springfield, so the US government decides to isolate the city underneath a giant dome. The Simpsons manage to escape and plan to start a new life in Alaska - but learn Springfield is about to be destroyed, and return to save their friends. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright and Yeardley Smith(n)

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A team of scientists on the International Space Station fight for survival when an intelligent alien life form is brought on board. The creature, nicknamed Calvin, proves it will do anthing to stay alive, and the crew risk everything to ensure it does not make its way to Earth. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds and Ariyon Bakare(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2
programme.desc: The team of intergalactic outlaws must fight to stay together as they unravel the mystery surrounding Peter Quill's father. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana and Kurt Russell, with the voices of Bradley Cooper and Vin Diesel(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Disgraced entrepreneur Michelle Darnell attempts to launch a comeback with the reluctant help of Claire Rawlings, her former PA. Comedy, starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage(n)

programme.title: The Best Man Holiday
programme.desc: A writer is worried about his future after losing his job at a university, and is also wrestling with the prospect of imminent fatherhood. He and his wife attend a Christmas reunion of his old friends from college, only to find all the guests have personal crises of their own to deal with. Comedy drama sequel, starring Taye Diggs, Sanaa Lathan, Morris Chestnut and Terrence Howard

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: An Italian socialite rebels against her domineering father and gets a job as a maid for a widowed father. While helping her employer learn to understand his three precocious children, she also falls in love with him and must decide whether or not to reveal her secret. Romantic comedy, starring Cary Grant and Sophia Loren

programme.title: The Poseidon Adventure
programme.desc: A luxury cruise liner at sea on New Year's Eve is struck by a freak tidal wave, which leaves it capsized and several passengers and crew trapped. A rebellious priest realises the ship is sinking fast, and leads a band of survivors up through the vessel in search of a way to the surface. Disaster movie, starring Gene Hackman, Ernest Borgnine, Shelley Winters, Leslie Nielsen and Roddy McDowall

programme.title: The Misfits
programme.desc: A divorcee forms a relationship with a group of latter-day cowboys struggling to eke out a living roping wild horses in the Nevada desert. John Huston's Western, starring Marilyn Monroe, Clark Gable, Montgomery Clift, Eli Wallach and Thelma Ritter

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman Interview Special
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart, Charlize Theron and Chris Hemsworth discuss making the fantasy adventure

programme.title: Snow White & the Huntsman
programme.desc: An evil queen learns that her reign will last for ever if she kills a princess, so sends a renowned warrior to find and murder her. However, he comes to realise his mistress's evil ways, and instead trains his intended victim to fight so they can bring the tyrant's rule to an end. Fantasy adventure, with Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Lady Bird Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Greta Gerwig and star Saoirse Ronan talk about making their beautifully observed coming-of-age story

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: A computer programmer working for the world's biggest search engine is given the opportunity to spend a week at the remote home of his boss, a hi-tech genius. The break turns out to be an elaborate experiment, in which he must test the world's first truly artificial intelligence, which is housed in the body of a beautiful robot girl. Sci-fi drama, starring Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander and Oscar Isaac

programme.title: Secretary
programme.desc: A shy and lonely woman who often indulges in self-harm is released from a mental hospital and returns to her Florida home town, where she takes a job as a lawyer's secretary. She soon embarks on a sadomasochistic relationship with her domineering boss that has a dramatic effect on both their lives. Steven Shainberg's comedy drama starring Maggie Gyllenhaal, James Spader, Lesley Ann Warren and Stephen McHattie

programme.title: Damsels in Distress
programme.desc: University freshman Lily is taken under the wing of ambitious, upbeat Violet and her clique, who are determine to stop the female members of the student body from letting their standards slip or succumbing to misery. However, friendships within the group are strained by romantic entanglements. Comedy, starring Greta Gerwig, Analeigh Tipton, Megalyn Echikunwoke and Carrie MacLemore

programme.title: In a Lonely Place
programme.desc: A quick-tempered screenwriter becomes chief suspect in the murder of a nightclub cloakroom attendant who was seen leaving his house. A sympathetic neighbour agrees to provide him with an alibi, but her growing doubts over his innocence drive him to violence. Film noir suspense thriller, based on the novel by Dorothy B Hughes, with Humphrey Bogart, Gloria Grahame, Frank Lovejoy and Carl Benton Reid

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Wealthy eccentric Sir Vincent Brampton arrives in Nairobi intent on hunting a legendary man-eating lion, and employs the services of disgraced big-game hunter Ken Duffield, who decides to use the expedition as an opportunity to settle an old score with the ruthless Kenyan terrorist who murdered his son. Adventure set during the Mau Mau Uprising in Kenya, starring Victor Mature, Roland Culver and Earl Cameron

programme.title: Thunder Over Arizona
programme.desc: An honest cowboy is mistaken for the notorious outlaw he killed in self-defence. Before he can clear up the misunderstanding, he is approached by a corrupt mayor who draws him into a conspiracy to wrest control of a silver mine from its rightful owners. Western, starring Skip Homeier, Kristine Miller, George Macready and Wallace Ford

programme.title: Ice Cold in Alex
programme.desc: The crew and passengers of an ambulance become stranded in the Libyan desert and face a perilous journey back to civilisation. Leading the trek is an alcoholic army captain, who vows to remain sober until he has completed the task - but his resolve is threatened by a stranger they rescue who is secretly an enemy spy. Second World War drama, with John Mills, Sylvia Syms, Anthony Quayle and Harry Andrews

programme.title: The Iron Lady Interview Special
programme.desc: Meryl Streep discusses her Oscar-winning performance as Margaret Thatcher

programme.title: The Iron Lady
programme.desc: The elderly Margaret Thatcher, now living in seclusion, tries to come to terms with the death of her husband Denis, bringing back memories of her controversial political career. She reflects on her rise to power in the male-dominated Conservative Party and the tumultuous events during her time in office. Biopic, starring an Oscar-winning Meryl Streep. With Jim Broadbent and Olivia Colman

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: A band of samurai is betrayed by a ruthless warlord who murders the warriors' master and banishes them from their homeland. They receive fresh hope in the shape of a mysterious former slave, who leads them into battle against monstrous and magical enemies as they seek to reclaim their former status. Fantasy adventure, starring Keanu Reeves and Hiroyuki Sanada

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: A boxing champion's successful life is brought to an abrupt end when tragedy strikes. He turns to a trainer coaching amateur fighters in a run-down gym for help and tries to rebuild his sporting career - while also striving to regain the lost trust of his wife and daughter. Drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Forest Whitaker and Rachel McAdams

programme.title: The Second Mother
programme.desc: A housekeeper has worked for a wealthy family for years, contentedly catering to their every need and acting as a surrogate mother to her employers' son. Everything changes when her estranged daughter returns home, and begins drawing attention to the unspoken divisions and injustices dividing the family from their servant. Drama, starring Regina Case, Camila Mardila and Michel Joelsa. In Portuguese(n)

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: The ruthless captain of a US destroyer develops an obsession with tracking down a Russian submarine. As he drives his men harder, he fails to anticipate the consequences of his actions - leading to a fatal mistake. Cold War thriller, starring Richard Widmark, Sidney Poitier, Martin Balsam, Wally Cox, Eric Portman and Donald Sutherland(n)

programme.title: Pursued
programme.desc: A brooding cowboy yearns to find peace, but his life seems to follow a tragic path because of the actions and hatred of a mysterious one-armed stranger and a forgotten incident from his childhood. Western, starring Robert Mitchum, Teresa Wright, Dean Jagger, Judith Anderson, Alan Hale and John Rodney(n)

programme.title: The Turning Point
programme.desc: A journalist helps a crusading district attorney who has been given the task of cracking down on a crime syndicate, but the pair's efforts are hampered by political corruption. Film noir, starring William Holden, Edmond O'Brien and Alexis Smith(n)

programme.title: Carry On Jack
programme.desc: A bumbling midshipman's uniform is stolen by a woman desperate to go to sea, who adopts his identity. Later, the hapless sailor is press-ganged on to the same ship as her. However, while trying to prove who he really is, he has to contend with mutinies, pirates and the Spanish Navy. Comedy, with Bernard Cribbins, Juliet Mills, Kenneth Williams and Charles Hawtrey(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Bees
programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl who accidentally killed her mother when she was a toddler flees her home, accompanied by the family's housekeeper. While searching for a location from her mother's past, they find solace with three sisters who run a bee-keeping business. Drama set in the deep south of America during the 1960s, starring Dakota Fanning, Queen Latifah, Jennifer Hudson and Alicia Keys(n)

programme.title: Lady Bird Interview Special
programme.desc: Greta Gerwig and Saoirse Ronan talk about making their beautifully observed coming-of-age story(n)

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Four American soldiers are sent on a mission into the mountains of Afghanistan to track down and eliminate a high-ranking terrorist leader. They soon find themselves faced with a terrible moral dilemma and a battle for survival against overwhelming odds. Fact-based drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Taylor Kitsch, Emile Hirsch and Ben Foster(n)

programme.title: Happy-Go-Lucky
programme.desc: An eternally optimistic schoolteacher is determined to maintain an upbeat attitude whatever life throws at her and help others to do the same. However, she meets her total opposite when she takes lessons with an embittered driving instructor perpetually raging at the world. Mike Leigh's comedy drama, starring Sally Hawkins, Eddie Marsan and Alexis Zegerman(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy falls in love with a French woman, and Cindy sees a vision of Ben before receiving distressing news

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob meets an old girlfriend who claims to be pregnant with his child, while Ben stands up to the guards in the PoW camp

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura realises she is in love with Jimmy while they are out collecting frogs. Meanwhile, Caroline becomes unhappy as Charles' new job takes him away with increasing frequency

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary takes a teaching job in an isolated town, but soon finds her methods are too radical for the conservative residents. Melissa Sue Anderson stars

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: On the anniversary of Lynda's death, Jim causes uproar by confessing that a letter he wrote may have contributed to the tragedy

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: While making preparations for baby Hannah's first birthday party, Joanie is pleased to learn that Ritchie, the girl's father, will be in town to join in with the celebrations. Unfortunately, she doesn't plan on him bringing a special guest of his own

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A lonely female novelist is in love with a legendary spy hero who has been dead for 20 years. She buys his sports car in an auction only to find out that his ghost comes with the car

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A selfish tycoon is given the chance to make amends for the pollution his company has been causing for years. Leslie Nielsen guest stars

programme.title: A Summer to Remember
programme.desc: Since losing his hearing to meningitis, Toby Wyler takes a bitter stance against the world and his family, refusing to accept his new stepfather. But when a highly trained orang-utan named Casey is thrown from a truck near his home, the boy soon has a secret friend he can communicate with through sign language. Comedy drama, starring Sean Gerlis, James Farentino and Tess Harper

programme.title: Gettysburg
programme.desc: Fact-based drama recreating the battle of the American Civil War, where Union and Confederate forces fought for three days in Pennsylvania, a confrontation that would change the course of the war. Starring Tom Berenger, Martin Sheen, Jeff Daniels and Stephen Lang

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The children are unhappy when Miss Hunter needs to take leave because of a family emergency and a substitute teacher is sent to take over her job

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Jim begins spending time with a friend of Syd's who is also a photo-journalist - but she and Joanie are quick to interfere

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Sparkling Cyanide
programme.desc: Modern reworking of Agatha Christie's classic murder mystery, starring Pauline Collins, Oliver Ford Davies, Kenneth Cranham and Susan Hampshire. A football chairman hosts a glitzy party to celebrate a new signing, but as the guests raise their glasses to toast a successful future, his wife suddenly drops dead. A pair of MI5 agents are called in to investigate, and it's not long before the finger of suspicion points at the victim's husband - until he too is murdered

programme.title: Agatha Christie's A Caribbean Mystery
programme.desc: Miss Marple arrives in the Bahamas for rest and recuperation, where she encounters a retired army officer with a secret to reveal. He claims to have proof that a guest at the resort is a killer, but before he can specify who, he is poisoned and the incriminating evidence disappears. It falls to the indomitable amateur sleuth to unmask the culprit. Drama, with Helen Hayes, Barnard Hughes, Season Hubley and Swoosie Kurtz

programme.title: Forbidden Love
programme.desc: Part one of two. Historical drama detailing the complex relationship between Thomas Jefferson and his slave Sally. Starring Sam Neill and Carmen Ejogo

programme.title: All the King's Men
programme.desc: Ambitious populist politician Willie Stark develops a reputation as a champion of the working classes. However, he finds the lure of power too much to resist, while his moral standards begin to slip in the race to become state governor. Remake of the 1949 drama, starring Sean Penn, Jude Law, Anthony Hopkins, Kate Winslet and Mark Ruffalo

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: Burke tackles a copycat killing inspired by a murder committed 20 years previously when a body wrapped in bin bags is recovered from the Clyde. Enlisting the help of celebrated pathologist Irene Russell, he races to solve the case before more victims die. As events unfold, it becomes clear that the ultimate target may be someone at the heart of the investigation. Alison Peebles guest stars

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The family hears of the atomic destruction of Hiroshima and awaits word of the Japanese Army's surrender. Jason, home on leave but believing he will soon be sent to the South Pacific, alienates his girlfriend Toni. Ben's captor allows him to return to the American forces, while Drew is turned down for military service

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben returns home with plans for the future, Cindy receives a visit from her father, and John has bad news about Olivia

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Caroline prepares to celebrate her wedding anniversary, but a broken wheel on Charles's wagon looks set to thwart the evening. Drama, starring Michael Landon

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Please Be My Friend - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Laura traces the author of a letter in a bottle, only to end up holding the baby. Drama, starring Michael Landon and Melissa Gilbert

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Kyle pesters Syd to go camping with him in the Grand Canyon, but she is more concerned with a homeless woman's welfare. Robbie plays matchmaker for a friend and Joanie becomes increasingly suspicious of Doug

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Kyle develops a potentially fatal infection and learns his arm may have to be amputated, while Syd discovers a seemingly perfect new doctor is actually hiding a disturbing secret. Melina Kanakaredes stars

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jonathan finds a stray dog, and decides to give it a new home at an orphanage

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part two of two. The boy Jonathan is helping faces a terrible choice between the family he has always dreamed of and his beloved dog

programme.title: The Engagement Ring
programme.desc: When a missing engagement ring turns up 40 years after it was lost, its appearance opens old wounds but also prompts a new romance to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Patricia Heaton, Vincent Spano, Tony Lo Bianco and David Hunt

programme.title: Pearl
programme.desc: Second World War drama following the lives of various people caught up in the attack on Pearl Harbor, including a colonel's embittered wife, a naval officer in love with a Japanese-American woman and a doctor troubled by her past. Starring Angie Dickinson, Dennis Weaver, Robert Wagner and Lesley Anne Warren

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma inherits an old friend's legacy and promptly decides to share the proceeds between her grandchildren, but her well-meaning action has unforeseen consequences

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd is upset to learn Jim and Monica have grown closer and Joanie is rescued from a smoke-filled bakery by a handsome fireman. Robbie's streak of good luck on the game show shows no sign of running out as he continues to win huge cash prizes

programme.title: My Father, My Son
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a US Navy Admiral's decision to use the Agent Orange defoliant during the Vietnam campaign - and the bitter realisation that it may have caused the cancer subsequently contracted by his soldier son. Starring Karl Malden, Keith Carradine, Dirk Blocker, Grace Zabriskie and Jenny Lewis

programme.title: Freshman Father
programme.desc: A high-school student gets a scholarship to Harvard, and then learns his girlfriend is pregnant. They get married, but his wife is unable to cope with parenthood and leaves him to raise the baby alone. An eccentric psychic takes him in as he struggles to prove he can be a good father and a dedicated student. Fact-based drama, starring Drew Seeley, Britt Irvin and Annie Potts

programme.title: Forbidden Love
programme.desc: Part two of two. Historical drama detailing the complex relationship between Thomas Jefferson and his slave Sally. Starring Sam Neill and Carmen Ejogo

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A 15-year-old with a remarkable talent for art is abandoned by his mother in a village on the Californian coast. He falls in with a group of criminals who offer him the chance to make some money by putting his talents to use producing counterfeit artwork. Crime drama, starring Josh Hutcherson, Hayden Panettiere, Lauren Bacall, Alfred Molina and Tricia Helfer

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Notorious Nun
programme.desc: A priest who was investigating financial corruption within the Church is murdered, and a nun is accused of the crime, leaving the portly attorney to defend her. Courtroom drama, starring Raymond Burr, William Katt, Barbara Hale and Timothy Bottoms

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen accepts Jonesy's marriage proposal, but regrets her choice when she discovers Curt may still be alive. Jason reopens the inn(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen travels to Florida, where she discovers Curt is alive, but a very different man(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Please Be My Friend - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Laura traces the author of a letter in a bottle, only to end up holding the baby. Drama, starring Michael Landon and Melissa Gilbert(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Friends and neighbours advise Charles on how to spend an inheritance he receives from a wealthy relative, but it isn't long before the farm is at risk, as he blows the cash prematurely. Drama, starring Michael Landon and Melissa Gilbert(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Sydney discovers Kyle's therapist has taken a special interest in him and Joanie has serious doubts about her father's pulling power as a cable TV presenter(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Kyle decides he needs to get away from family and friends, whose over-solicitous behaviour is delaying his recovery, while Jim is upset at being dropped from his TV show(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A boxing trainer is reminded of his own shady past when one of his fighters is asked to throw a match(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a doctor to make peace with his past and deal with the secrets he has been keeping from his neighbours(n)

programme.title: A Kind of Loving
programme.desc: A factory worker gets his girlfriend pregnant, forcing them to endure years of misery and dashed hopes as they marry and move in with her disapproving, nagging mother. John Schlesinger's drama, starring Alan Bates, June Ritchie and Thora Hird(n)

programme.title: Pearl
programme.desc: Second World War drama following the lives of various people caught up in the attack on Pearl Harbor, including a colonel's embittered wife, a naval officer in love with a Japanese-American woman and a doctor troubled by her past. Starring Angie Dickinson, Dennis Weaver, Robert Wagner and Lesley Anne Warren(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: An airmail plane has engine trouble and the pilot has to take emergency measures by landing the craft in the Waltons' meadow(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: A terrible headache leaves Syd experiencing bizarre hallucinations, where she encounters the characters from Alice in Wonderland. Joanie and fireman Burt look forward to a relaxing weekend away together - but find that their hosts at the remote B&B have other plans for them(n)

programme.title: Elvis: The Early Years
programme.desc: The first in a two-part biopic of the king of rock 'n' roll, Elvis Presley, charting his humble beginnings in Tupelo, Mississippi, to his recordings at Sun Studios in Memphis and his conscription into the US army. Jonathan Rhys Meyers plays the singer, with Rose McGowan, Camryn Manheim and Randy Quaid(n)

programme.title: Elvis: The Early Years
programme.desc: Conclusion of the rock 'n' roll biopic, starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers as the much-loved performer. Following his varied film career and the rise of pop music, Elvis stages a comeback, but his reliance on drugs intensifies as the demands of fame take hold. With Rose McGowan and Randy Quaid(n)

programme.title: Guilty Hearts
programme.desc: Part one of two. . A salacious affair between a church organist and a deacon leads to murder and a twisted tale of lies. Fact-based crime drama, starring Treat Williams, Marcia Gay Harden and Gary Basaraba(n)

programme.title: The Freshman
programme.desc: A powerful New York underworld boss takes a penniless film student under his wing in an attempt to educate him in the criminal ways. Comedy drama, starring Marlon Brando, Matthew Broderick, Penelope Ann Miller, Bruno Kirby and Frank Whaley(n)

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Sinister Spirit
programme.desc: Jordan White, a publisher friend of Perry, is invited to a reputedly haunted hotel where one of the guests falls from the balcony to a grizzly death below. When Jordan is wrongly implicated in the murder, it is up to the indomitable attorney to clear his acquaintance's name. Mystery, starring Raymond Burr, Matthew Faison and Robert Stack(n)

programme.title: A Perry Mason Mystery: The Case of the Wicked Wives
programme.desc: Flamboyant lawyer Anthony Caruso steps into the big man's shoes to investigate a murder in the glamorous world of fashion photography, uncovering sordid tales of lust and revenge revolving around a much-married cameraman. programme.desc: Kyle pesters Syd to go camping with him in the Grand Canyon, but she is more concerned with a homeless woman's welfare. Robbie plays matchmaker for a friend and Joanie becomes increasingly suspicious of Doug

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Kyle develops a potentially fatal infection and learns his arm may have to be amputated, while Syd discovers a seemingly perfect new doctor is actually hiding a disturbing secret. Melina Kanakaredes stars

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jonathan finds a stray dog, and decides to give it a new home at an orphanage

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part two of two. The boy Jonathan is helping faces a terrible choice between the family he has always dreamed of and his beloved dog

programme.title: The Engagement Ring
programme.desc: When a missing engagement ring turns up 40 years after it was lost, its appearance opens old wounds but also prompts a new romance to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Patricia Heaton, Vincent Spano, Tony Lo Bianco and David Hunt

programme.title: Pearl
programme.desc: Second World War drama following the lives of various people caught up in the attack on Pearl Harbor, including a colonel's embittered wife, a naval officer in love with a Japanese-American woman and a doctor troubled by her past. Starring Angie Dickinson, Dennis Weaver, Robert Wagner and Lesley Anne Warren

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma inherits an old friend's legacy and promptly decides to share the proceeds between her grandchildren, but her well-meaning action has unforeseen consequences

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd is upset to learn Jim and Monica have grown closer and Joanie is rescued from a smoke-filled bakery by a handsome fireman. Robbie's streak of good luck on the game show shows no sign of running out as he continues to win huge cash prizes

programme.title: My Father, My Son
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a US Navy Admiral's decision to use the Agent Orange defoliant during the Vietnam campaign - and the bitter realisation that it may have caused the cancer subsequently contracted by his soldier son. Starring Karl Malden, Keith Carradine, Dirk Blocker, Grace Zabriskie and Jenny Lewis

programme.title: Freshman Father
programme.desc: A high-school student gets a scholarship to Harvard, and then learns his girlfriend is pregnant. They get married, but his wife is unable to cope with parenthood and leaves him to raise the baby alone. An eccentric psychic takes him in as he struggles to prove he can be a good father and a dedicated student. Fact-based drama, starring Drew Seeley, Britt Irvin and Annie Potts

programme.title: Forbidden Love
programme.desc: Part two of two. Historical drama detailing the complex relationship between Thomas Jefferson and his slave Sally. Starring Sam Neill and Carmen Ejogo

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A 15-year-old with a remarkable talent for art is abandoned by his mother in a village on the Californian coast. He falls in with a group of criminals who offer him the chance to make some money by putting his talents to use producing counterfeit artwork. Crime drama, starring Josh Hutcherson, Hayden Panettiere, Lauren Bacall, Alfred Molina and Tricia Helfer

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Notorious Nun
programme.desc: A priest who was investigating financial corruption within the Church is murdered, and a nun is accused of the crime, leaving the portly attorney to defend her. Courtroom drama, starring Raymond Burr, William Katt, Barbara Hale and Timothy Bottoms(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen accepts Jonesy's marriage proposal, but regrets her choice when she discovers Curt may still be alive. Jason reopens the inn(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen travels to Florida, where she discovers Curt is alive, but a very different man(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Please Be My Friend - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Laura traces the author of a letter in a bottle, only to end up holding the baby. Drama, starring Michael Landon and Melissa Gilbert(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Friends and neighbours advise Charles on how to spend an inheritance he receives from a wealthy relative, but it isn't long before the farm is at risk, as he blows the cash prematurely. Drama, starring Michael Landon and Melissa Gilbert(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Sydney discovers Kyle's therapist has taken a special interest in him and Joanie has serious doubts about her father's pulling power as a cable TV presenter(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Kyle decides he needs to get away from family and friends, whose over-solicitous behaviour is delaying his recovery, while Jim is upset at being dropped from his TV show(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A boxing trainer is reminded of his own shady past when one of his fighters is asked to throw a match(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a doctor to make peace with his past and deal with the secrets he has been keeping from his neighbours(n)

programme.title: A Kind of Loving
programme.desc: A factory worker gets his girlfriend pregnant, forcing them to endure years of misery and dashed hopes as they marry and move in with her disapproving, nagging mother. John Schlesinger's drama, starring Alan Bates, June Ritchie and Thora Hird(n)

programme.title: Pearl
programme.desc: Second World War drama following the lives of various people caught up in the attack on Pearl Harbor, including a colonel's embittered wife, a naval officer in love with a Japanese-American woman and a doctor troubled by her past. Starring Angie Dickinson, Dennis Weaver, Robert Wagner and Lesley Anne Warren(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: An airmail plane has engine trouble and the pilot has to take emergency measures by landing the craft in the Waltons' meadow(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: A terrible headache leaves Syd experiencing bizarre hallucinations, where she encounters the characters from Alice in Wonderland. Joanie and fireman Burt look forward to a relaxing weekend away together - but find that their hosts at the remote B&B have other plans for them(n)

programme.title: Elvis: The Early Years
programme.desc: The first in a two-part biopic of the king of rock 'n' roll, Elvis Presley, charting his humble beginnings in Tupelo, Mississippi, to his recordings at Sun Studios in Memphis and his conscription into the US army. Jonathan Rhys Meyers plays the singer, with Rose McGowan, Camryn Manheim and Randy Quaid(n)

programme.title: Elvis: The Early Years
programme.desc: Conclusion of the rock 'n' roll biopic, starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers as the much-loved performer. Following his varied film career and the rise of pop music, Elvis stages a comeback, but his reliance on drugs intensifies as the demands of fame take hold. With Rose McGowan and Randy Quaid(n)

programme.title: Guilty Hearts
programme.desc: Part one of two. . A salacious affair between a church organist and a deacon leads to murder and a twisted tale of lies. Fact-based crime drama, starring Treat Williams, Marcia Gay Harden and Gary Basaraba(n)

programme.title: The Freshman
programme.desc: A powerful New York underworld boss takes a penniless film student under his wing in an attempt to educate him in the criminal ways. Comedy drama, starring Marlon Brando, Matthew Broderick, Penelope Ann Miller, Bruno Kirby and Frank Whaley(n)

In the border town of Juarez, a trafficker explains how heroin is transported to the US as Mexican Federal police undertake an operation to bust a dealer. In Columbus, Special Agent James executes a significant drug bust and starts tracking the local heroin supply back to its cartel sources when a key suspect disappears. In Atlanta, John hits the street to feed his habit before an impending court date but feels guilty for manipulating his family(c)

programme.title: Rolling Back Obama
programme.desc: The President sets out to reverse every last one of President Obama's accomplishments, while a dapper Jared Kushner and intense Stephen Miller spark an unlikely friendship(c)

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: As a way to pay off their mounting debts, lifelong pals Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) decide to write, direct and star in a pornographic movie, which they believe to be a sure moneymaker. But they may end up as the first couple in adult cinematic history that discovers long-hidden feelings for each other while doing so. Craig Robinson costars in this romantic sex comedy

programme.title: Extreme Movie
programme.desc: A teenager suffering from the pain of lifelong virginity sets his sexual sights on his school's most popular girl in this raunchy sketch comedy featuring appearances from Michael Cera, Frankie Muniz and Beverly Mitchell

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as Professor Sherman Klump, a hugely obese scientist who falls for the lovely Professor Carla Purty (Jada Pinkett Smith). Desperate for her affections, Klump invents a DNA-altering drug that temporarily transforms him into the slender, testosterone-overloaded jerk, Buddy Love. Soon, both egos are competing for dominance and Carla's attention. Dave Chappelle and James Coburn co-star. Murphy also plays the entire Klump family

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two fathers (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) join the ranks of the unemployed. They are forced to take their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy and become stay-at-home fathers. With no job possibilities on the horizon, the two dads decide to open their own day care facility, which boasts some fairly unconventional methods of tending the kids. As their day care starts to catch on, it launches them into a competition with Chapman Academy's tough-as-nails director (Anjelica Huston) for the hearts and minds of the children

programme.title: Miracle
programme.desc: Kurt Russell plays determined United States ice hockey coach Herb Brooks, who has the impossible dream of beating the seemingly unbeatable Soviet Union the 1980 Winter Olympics. Starting with a handpicked group of 26 undisciplined kids, Brooks coaches them to play like they've never played before, and turns 20 of them into a team that believes they could achieve the unachievable. Based on the true story

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: When a train carrying atomic warheads mysteriously crashes in the former Soviet Union, brilliant U.S. nuclear specialist Dr. Julia Kelly (Nicole Kidman) discovers the accident is really part of a diabolical plot to cover up the theft of the weapons. Assigned to help her recover the missing bombs, Special Forces Colonel Thomas Devoe (George Clooney), has a brash, take-no-prisoners style that clashes with Kelly's diplomatic approach. Putting aside their personal differences, the two begin a partnership and try to track down the stolen weapons

programme.title: G.I. Jane
programme.desc: Demi Moore stars as gutsy Lieutenant O'Neil, the first woman ever given the opportunity to earn a place in the armed forces most highly skilled combat unit - the elite Navy SEALS. But the already brutal rigors of training camp turn into an unimaginable test of courage and determination once it becomes clear that no one - not powerful politicians, top military brass, or her male Navy SEAL teammates - wants her to succeed!
